```{python}
import pandas as pd
from pygam import LinearGAM, s, f
from pygam.datasets import wage
```


```{python}
X, y = wage()
```


```{python}
gam = LinearGAM(s(0) + s(1) + f(2)).fit(X, y)
gam.summary()
```
